items.item: I promise to think over your proposal, but don't ……………..
If he carries on driving like that, he'll …………. Dead.
…………….., the old man wished he had traveled more during his younger days.
Their bodies may …………….. calcium and magnesium.
Jane still ……………….. against me for refusing to lend her some money.
…………………… otherwise you might get into trouble!
I won't pay …………. you provide the goods immediately.
The doctor told me to ……………… the spicy food for a while
………………. Bill. He’s still too young to manage that on his own.
Those stores are ……………—their parent company filed bankruptcy a few years ago
